dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Al scrap, new; Aluminium waste, fresh; Alumina residue, new; Aluminium metallic scrap, unprocessed
Al scrap, new; Aluminium waste, fresh; Alumina residue, new; Aluminium metallic scrap, unprocessed
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow describes new aluminium scrap, indicating that the scrap is recently produced and has not undergone any previous recycling processes. It includes details on its processing level as well as technical aspects such as purity, potential alloys present, and size or form factor of the scrap. The description also may include information regarding the compliance with relevant industry standards, possible applications or industries where it can be used, as well as production or extraction methods used to obtain the aluminium initially. Additionally, the product flow specifies that the aluminium scrap is a production mix, mainly found at recycling facilities or plants, awaiting to be processed and reintroduced into the manufacturing cycle.
该产品流描述了新的铝废料，表示废料是最近产生的，并且尚未经历任何以前的回收过程。它包括关于其处理级别以及技术方面的详细信息，例如纯度、可能存在的合金成分、以及废料的大小或外形因素。描述还可能包括有关遵守相关行业标准的信息、可以使用的可能的应用程序或行业，以及用于最初获得铝的生产或提取方法。此外，产品流指定铝废料是生产混合物，主要在回收设施或工厂中找到，在等待被加工并重新引入制造周期。
